alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:43PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Sierra, northeastern Luna and northwestern Dona Ana Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Engle to near Spaceport America to 3 miles west of Derry. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hatch, Upham, Arrey, Rincon, Derry, Salem, Garfield, Spaceport America, Uvas Valley and Portions of Jornada Experimental Range. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 28 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
